channel.title: Easy guitar songs?
channel.description: Hi! I got my first acoustic guitar a couple days ago and have been messing around with it. Right now I can play the smoke on the water riff, sweet home alabama and the pirates of the caribbean theme song intro. Anyone know what EASY songs I should try? I looked up sth and found out that "Horse with no name" was relatively easy so I tried it out, but I couldn't get the rhythm right so fuck that.

item.title: Easy guitar songs?
item.dc:creator: @Syfal Syfal
item.description:
@Syfal wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:4, topic:303200”]Carry On Wayward Son by Kansas is pretty easy, and it sounds cool.
Definitely get Guitar Pro, it makes everything so much easier. I have no idea how I learned anything quickly for the 4 years before I discovered it.[/quote]

The main riff is, but the solo takes some time to get right

Read full topic

item.title: Easy guitar songs?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:7, topic:303200”][quote author=sppt link=topic=399454.msg2963511#msg2963511 date=1253407911]

+1 for guitar pro. dont bother with RSE, although it sounds better its got memory leaks

Only for you perhaps… I barely notice any memory leaks, if any at all…
[/quote]
do you have version 5.2? thats the only one that gets leaks from RSE[/quote]
yeah, 5.2.
Guitar pro has been open for an hour now (not playing anymore) and it’s using 74mb of ram.

Read full topic

+1 for guitar pro. dont bother with RSE, although it sounds better its got memory leaks

item.title: Easy guitar songs?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Carry On Wayward Son by Kansas is pretty easy, and it sounds cool.
Definitely get Guitar Pro, it makes everything so much easier. I have no idea how I learned anything quickly for the 4 years before I discovered it.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy guitar songs?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy, find a torrent for guitar pro.

It’s a program which has the tabs in front of you and you play along to them, it makes learning the rhythm a lot easier, and it’s also a lot more fun because all the other instruments are usually on there too and it feels like you are in a band.

(oh p.s. go to www.ultimate-guitar.com to get tabs)

Read full topic

item.title: Easy guitar songs?

item.description:

Hi! I got my first acoustic guitar a couple days ago and have been messing around with it. Right now I can play the smoke on the water riff, sweet home alabama and the pirates of the caribbean theme song intro. Anyone know what EASY songs I should try?
